Package org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.PlayerStates

package org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.PlayerStates

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Accepting
    The Accepting class represents a specific state of a player in the game where the player has the ability to accept or decline certain game-related actions.
    AddCrewState
    Represents the state of a player when they are allowed to add crew members to their game board.
    BaseState
    BaseState represents a specific state of a player in the game.
    BuildingShip
    Represents the state in which a player is constructing a ship.
    CheckValidity
    The CheckValidity class represents a specific state in the player's lifecycle, inheriting from the abstract PlayerState class.
    ChoosePosition
    The ChoosePosition class is a specific state implementation extending the PlayerState abstract class.
    ChoosingPlanet
    The ChoosingPlanet class represents the player state where a player is in the process of selecting a planet.
    ConsumingEnergy
    The ConsumingEnergy class represents a state in which the player is performing actions related to energy consumption within the game.
    DefendingFromLarge
    Represents the "Defending From Large" state of a player in the game.
    DefendingFromSmall
    * Represents the "DefendingFromSmall" state of a player in the game.
    GiveAttack
    The GiveAttack class represents a specific state of a player in the game where the player can initiate an attack action.
    GiveSpeed
    The GiveSpeed class represents a specific player state that allows the execution of the GiveSpeedCommand and related actions.
    HandleCargo
    The HandleCargo class represents a specific state of a player where they can perform cargo-related actions.
    HandleDestruction
    The HandleDestruction class represents a specific state of the player during the game, where the player has to handle the aftermath of destruction events such as meteor strikes.
    HandleTheft
    The HandleTheft class is a concrete implementation of the PlayerState class, responsible for handling specific behaviors and states associated with theft-related actions in the game.
    Killing
    The Killing class represents a specific state of the player within the game, extending the PlayerState class.
    PlayerState
    Represents an abstract state of a player in the game.
    ReadCardState
    Represents the state of a player where they are in the "read card" phase of the game.
    Waiting
    Represents a state in which a player is waiting and has no immediate action to perform.
    WaitingEpidemic
    The WaitingEpidemic class represents a specialized state that extends the Waiting state in a game framework.
